column20: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
column21: Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.
column22: Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
column169: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.
column170: Baron Bunny: • Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. • Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. • When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
column171: Hold: Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
column222: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.
column223: Burst Fiery Rain DMG Per Wave
column303: Every Arrow Finds Its Target: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.
column304: Precise Shot: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.
column305: One Arrow to Rule Them All: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
column306: Bunny Triggered: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it. Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
column307: It Burns!: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column308: It's Not Just Any Doll...: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
column309: It's Baron Bunny!: Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column310: Wildfire: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
